Preference.android:title: Clear Dalvik Cache
Preference.android:summary: Clears your Dalvik Cache. This can help with force closes after making changes to system folders.

Preference.android:title: Clear Cache
Preference.android:summary: Clears your cache partition. This includes web images, temporary files, etc.

Preference.android:title: Fix Permissions
Preference.android:summary: This will fix permissions on the system. It can help with Force Closes or strange behavior.
